product.title: Toy Story 2 | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
In the delightful sequel to the widely popular Toy Story, our hero, Andy, departs for summer camp, leaving the toys alone for a few weeks of mischief. When one of the toys, Woody, is kidnapped by a fanatic collector, Buzz Lightyear and his squad of comical comrades—Slinky Dog®, Mr. Potato Head®, Rex®, and Hamm—launch a rescue mission. This page-turner is sure to capture kids’ imaginations as they follow the concerted efforts of the team of toys, learning the importance of critical thinking, friendship, and tenacity.

Tie-in Activity: Encourage your child to stretch the boundaries of his imagination by creating personalities for his favorite toys. Together, pretend they’re real and assign them names, jobs, likes, and dislikes.
product.text:
Click on one of the tiles above to have more fun with Woody, Buzz, and the rest of the toys.
